name: tm06
effect: Teaches Toxic to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Toxic to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
Poisons the foe
with a toxin that
gradually worsens.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
Poisons the foe
with a toxin that

poisons the foe.

worsens every turn.
